'''''Tolkien's Middle-earth: A Book of 20 Postcards'''''  is a book containing postcards with illustrations inspired by [[Middle-earth]].

==From the back==

A book of 20 postcards featuring the landscapes and cities of Tolkien's magical world. Artists include John Howe, Roger Garland, Alan Lee and Ted Nasmith.
